segments.text: What a pitiful sight in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her dish, missing everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows the sink, soaking the floor sadly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddleâ€” she might slip and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's after cookies, but it's such a dangerous game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tips; my heart aches thinking of the tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, innocent and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing treats in secret, breaking trust.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets drip with water; damage is inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden blooms, untouched by sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unnoticed chaos just makes me feel down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and make it right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so fragile and fleeting.
segments.speaker: PAR
